name: barrenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that lacks plants, fruit, or anything needed or useful : The photographer is noted for her barrenly beautiful landscapes that show no hint of being populated by humans. The shelves at the supermarket were barrenly empty as customers rushed to stock up on supplies before the storm hit.
More examplesFewer examplesWe looked to see if there was any food in the house, but the pantry was barrenly clean. In our sights was a barrenly formidable uninhabited island, with steep cliffs over a rocky beach.
